mapper.insert: insert into goods (goodId, goodName, goodNum, editTime, editUser) values (#{goodId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{goodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{editTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{editUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select goodId, goodName, goodNum, editTime, editUser from goods

select goodId, goodName, goodNum, editTime, editUser from goods
and goodName like concat('%',#{goodName},'%')
